item.title: I forgot to bring my ID to the airport — here’s how I was still able to fly
item.description: Forgot to bring your ID to the airport? The TSA may still let you fly. Here’s what happens, how identity verification works and tips to avoid it next ...

item.title: United draws ‘line in the sand’ against American in Chicago turf war
item.description: United Airlines is set to do everything it can to keep American Airlines from expanding its footprint in Chicago.

item.title: New Bilt Cash details are here — including option to earn 3x everyday points on the Palladium Card
item.description: Bilt has announced some of the ways you can spend Bilt Cash. Here's how you can earn 3 points per dollar spent on the Palladium Card, plus more option...

item.title: End of the golden age: Qantas restricts Emirates first-class award seats and raises prices
item.description: Qantas is restricting Emirates first-class awards, adding a status requirement and raising Qantas points prices. Here’s what’s changing and when.

item.title: How to use ExpertFlyer alerts to snag a better seat on the plane
item.description: ExpertFlyer has many terrific tools for travelers, including the seat alert feature. This feature notifies you when a better seat becomes available.
